cobblemon.species.zarude.desc1: Within dense forests, this Pokémon lives in a pack with others of its kind. It’s incredibly aggressive, and the other Pokémon of the forest fear it.
cobblemon.species.zarude.desc2: Once the vines on Zarude’s body tear off, they become nutrients in the soil. This helps the plants of the forest grow.
cobblemon.species.regieleki.name: Regieleki
cobblemon.species.regieleki.desc1: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It’s said that removing the rings on Regieleki’s body will unleash the Pokémon’s latent power.
cobblemon.species.regieleki.desc2: Its entire body is made up of a single organ that generates electrical energy. Regieleki is capable of creating all Galar’s electricity.
cobblemon.species.regidrago.name: Regidrago
cobblemon.species.regidrago.desc1: An academic theory proposes that Regidrago’s arms were once the head of an ancient dragon Pokémon. The theory remains unproven.
cobblemon.species.regidrago.desc2: Its body is composed of crystallized dragon energy. Regidrago is said to have the powers of every dragon Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.glastrier.name: Glastrier
cobblemon.species.glastrier.desc1: Glastrier emits intense cold from its hooves. It’s also a belligerent Pokémon—anything it wants, it takes by force.
cobblemon.species.glastrier.desc2: Glastrier has tremendous physical strength, and the mask of ice covering its face is 100 times harder than diamond.
cobblemon.species.spectrier.name: Spectrier
cobblemon.species.spectrier.desc1: It probes its surroundings with all its senses save one—it doesn’t use its sense of sight. Spectrier’s kicks are said to separate soul from body.
cobblemon.species.spectrier.desc2: As it dashes through the night, Spectrier absorbs the life-force of sleeping creatures. It craves silence and solitude.
cobblemon.species.calyrex.name: Calyrex
cobblemon.species.calyrex.desc1: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.
cobblemon.species.calyrex.desc2: Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.
cobblemon.species.enamorus.name: Enamorus
cobblemon.species.enamorus.desc1: When it flies to this land from across the sea, the bitter winter comes to an end. According to legend, this Pokémon's love gives rise to the budding of fresh life across Hisui.
cobblemon.species.ivysaur.name: Ivysaur
cobblemon.species.ivysaur.desc1: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
cobblemon.species.ivysaur.desc2: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
cobblemon.species.venusaur.name: Venusaur
cobblemon.species.venusaur.desc1: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
cobblemon.species.venusaur.desc2: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.name: Charmeleon
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.desc1: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
cobblemon.species.charmeleon.desc2: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.charizard.name: Charizard
cobblemon.species.charizard.desc1: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
cobblemon.species.charizard.desc2: Its wings can carry this Pokémon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
cobblemon.species.wartortle.name: Wartortle
cobblemon.species.wartortle.desc1: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
cobblemon.species.wartortle.desc2: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
cobblemon.species.blastoise.name: Blastoise
cobblemon.species.blastoise.desc1: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
cobblemon.species.blastoise.desc2: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
cobblemon.species.metapod.name: Metapod
cobblemon.species.metapod.desc1: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
cobblemon.species.metapod.desc2: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It can’t withstand a harsh attack.
cobblemon.species.butterfree.name: Butterfree
cobblemon.species.butterfree.desc1: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
cobblemon.species.butterfree.desc2: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
cobblemon.species.kakuna.name: Kakuna
cobblemon.species.kakuna.desc1: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
cobblemon.species.beedrill.name: Beedrill
cobblemon.species.beedrill.desc1: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
cobblemon.species.pidgeotto.name: Pidgeotto
cobblemon.species.pidgeotto.desc1: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
cobblemon.species.pidgeot.name: Pidgeot
cobblemon.species.pidgeot.desc1: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
cobblemon.species.raticate.name: Raticate
cobblemon.species.raticate.desc1: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
cobblemon.species.fearow.name: Fearow
cobblemon.species.fearow.desc1: A Pokémon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
cobblemon.species.arbok.name: Arbok
cobblemon.species.arbok.desc1: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
cobblemon.species.toxtricity.name: Toxtricity
cobblemon.species.toxtricity.desc1: When this Pokémon sounds as if it’s strumming a guitar, it’s actually clawing at the protrusions on its chest to generate electricity.
cobblemon.species.toxtricity.desc2: This short-tempered and aggressive Pokémon chugs stagnant water to absorb any toxins it might contain.
cobblemon.species.centiskorch.name: Centiskorch
cobblemon.species.centiskorch.desc1: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit. It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
cobblemon.species.centiskorch.desc2: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.
cobblemon.species.hatterene.name: Hatterene
cobblemon.species.hatterene.desc1: It emits psychic power strong enough to cause headaches as a deterrent to the approach of others.
cobblemon.species.hatterene.desc2: If you’re too loud around it, you risk being torn apart by the claws on its tentacle. This Pokémon is also known as the Forest Witch.
cobblemon.species.morgrem.name: Morgrem
cobblemon.species.morgrem.desc1: When it gets down on all fours as if to beg for forgiveness, it’s trying to lure opponents in so that it can stab them with its spear-like hair.
cobblemon.species.morgrem.desc2: With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the woods. Some believe it to have the power to make crops grow.
cobblemon.species.grimmsnarl.name: Grimmsnarl
cobblemon.species.grimmsnarl.desc1: With the hair wrapped around its body helping to enhance its muscles, this Pokémon can overwhelm even Machamp.
cobblemon.species.grimmsnarl.desc2: Its hairs work like muscle fibers. When its hairs unfurl, they latch on to opponents, ensnaring them as tentacles would.
cobblemon.species.obstagoon.name: Obstagoon
cobblemon.species.obstagoon.desc1: Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon has a tendency to take on a threatening posture and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.
cobblemon.species.obstagoon.desc2: It evolved after experiencing numerous fights. While crossing its arms, it lets out a shout that would make any opponent flinch.
cobblemon.species.perrserker.name: Perrserker
cobblemon.species.perrserker.desc1: What appears to be an iron helmet is actually hardened hair. This Pokémon lives for the thrill of battle.
cobblemon.species.perrserker.desc2: After many battles, it evolved dangerous claws that come together to form daggers when extended.
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.name: Sirfetch’d
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.desc1: Only Farfetch’d that have survived many battles can attain this evolution. When this Pokémon’s leek withers, it will retire from combat.
cobblemon.species.sirfetchd.desc2: After deflecting attacks with its hard leaf shield, it strikes back with its sharp leek stalk. The leek stalk is both weapon and food.
cobblemon.species.mrrime.name: Mr. Rime
cobblemon.species.mrrime.desc1: It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane of ice in time with its graceful movements.
cobblemon.species.mrrime.desc2: Its amusing movements make it very popular. It releases its psychic power from the pattern on its belly.
cobblemon.species.runerigus.name: Runerigus
cobblemon.species.runerigus.desc1: A powerful curse was woven into an ancient painting. After absorbing the spirit of a Yamask, the painting began to move.
cobblemon.species.runerigus.desc2: Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be shown the horrific memories behind the picture carved into it.
cobblemon.species.alcremie.name: Alcremie
cobblemon.species.alcremie.desc1: When it trusts a Trainer, it will treat them to berries it’s decorated with cream.
cobblemon.species.alcremie.desc2: When Alcremie is content, the cream it secretes from its hands becomes sweeter and richer.
cobblemon.species.frosmoth.name: Frosmoth
cobblemon.species.frosmoth.desc1: Icy scales fall from its wings like snow as it flies over fields and mountains. The temperature of its wings is less than −290 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.frosmoth.desc2: It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings, causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.
cobblemon.species.copperajah.name: Copperajah
cobblemon.species.copperajah.desc1: They came over from another region long ago and worked together with humans. Their green skin is resistant to water.
cobblemon.species.copperajah.desc2: These Pokémon live in herds. Their trunks have incredible grip strength, strong enough to crush giant rocks into powder.
cobblemon.species.drakloak.name: Drakloak
cobblemon.species.drakloak.desc1: It’s capable of flying faster than 120 mph. It battles alongside Dreepy and dotes on them until they successfully evolve.
cobblemon.species.drakloak.desc2: Without a Dreepy to place on its head and care for, it gets so uneasy it’ll try to substitute any Pokémon it finds for the missing Dreepy.
cobblemon.species.dragapult.name: Dragapult
cobblemon.species.dragapult.desc1: When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.
cobblemon.species.dragapult.desc2: Apparently the Dreepy inside Dragapult’s horns eagerly look forward to being launched out at Mach speeds.
cobblemon.species.urshifu.name: Urshifu
cobblemon.species.urshifu.desc1: This form of Urshifu is a strong believer in the one-hit KO. Its strategy is to leap in close to foes and land a devastating blow with a hardened fist.
cobblemon.species.urshifu.desc2: Inhabiting the mountains of a distant region, this Pokémon races across sheer cliffs, training its legs and refining its moves.
cobblemon.species.wyrdeer.name: Wyrdeer
cobblemon.species.wyrdeer.desc1: The black orbs shine with an uncanny light when the Pokémon is erecting invisible barriers. The fur shed from its beard retains heat well and is a highly useful material for winter clothing.
cobblemon.species.kleavor.name: Kleavor
cobblemon.species.kleavor.desc1: A violent creature that fells towering trees with its crude axes and shields itself with hard stone. If one should chance upon this Pokémon in the wilds, one's only recourse is to flee.
cobblemon.species.ursaluna.name: Ursaluna
cobblemon.species.ursaluna.desc1: I believe it was Hisui's swampy terrain that gave Ursaluna its burly physique and newfound capacity to manipulate peat at will.
cobblemon.species.basculegion.name: Basculegion
cobblemon.species.basculegion.desc1: Clads itself in the souls of comrades that perished before fulfilling their goals of journeying upstream. No other species throughout all Hisui's rivers is Basculegion's equal.
cobblemon.species.sneasler.name: Sneasler
cobblemon.species.sneasler.desc1: Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.
cobblemon.species.overqwil.name: Overqwil
cobblemon.species.overqwil.desc1: Its lancelike spikes and savage temperament have earned it the nickname ”sea fiend.” It slurps up poison to nourish itself.
cobblemon.species.pikachu.name: Pikachu
cobblemon.species.pikachu.desc1: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.
cobblemon.species.pikachu.desc2: When Pikachu meet, they’ll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.
cobblemon.species.raichu.name: Raichu
cobblemon.species.raichu.desc1: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
cobblemon.species.raichu.desc2: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.
cobblemon.species.sandslash.name: Sandslash
cobblemon.species.sandslash.desc1: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokémon’s spikes will feel when touched.
cobblemon.species.sandslash.desc2: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.
cobblemon.species.nidorina.name: Nidorina
cobblemon.species.nidorina.desc1: The horn on its head has atrophied. It’s thought that this happens so Nidorina’s children won’t get poked while their mother is feeding them.
cobblemon.species.nidorina.desc2: If the group is threatened, these Pokémon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.
cobblemon.species.nidoqueen.name: Nidoqueen
cobblemon.species.nidoqueen.desc1: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokémon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
cobblemon.species.nidoqueen.desc2: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.
cobblemon.species.nidorino.name: Nidorino
cobblemon.species.nidorino.desc1: With a horn that’s harder than diamond, this Pokémon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.
cobblemon.species.nidorino.desc2: It’s nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.
cobblemon.species.nidoking.name: Nidoking
cobblemon.species.nidoking.desc1: When it goes on a rampage, it’s impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen it’s lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
cobblemon.species.nidoking.desc2: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. It’s forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.
cobblemon.species.clefairy.name: Clefairy
cobblemon.species.clefairy.desc1: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
cobblemon.species.clefairy.desc2: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokémon is rarely found.
cobblemon.species.clefable.name: Clefable
cobblemon.species.clefable.desc1: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
cobblemon.species.clefable.desc2: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so they’re usually found in quiet places.
cobblemon.species.ninetales.name: Ninetales
cobblemon.species.ninetales.desc1: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
cobblemon.species.ninetales.desc2: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
cobblemon.species.jigglypuff.name: Jigglypuff
cobblemon.species.jigglypuff.desc1: Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokémon. It won’t stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.
cobblemon.species.jigglypuff.desc2: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
cobblemon.species.wigglytuff.name: Wigglytuff
cobblemon.species.wigglytuff.desc1: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.
cobblemon.species.wigglytuff.desc2: It’s proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture that’s perfectly heavenly.
cobblemon.species.golbat.name: Golbat
cobblemon.species.golbat.desc1: It loves to drink other creatures’ blood. It’s said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood it’s gathered.
cobblemon.species.golbat.desc2: Its feet are tiny, but this Pokémon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.
cobblemon.species.gloom.name: Gloom
cobblemon.species.gloom.desc1: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.
cobblemon.species.gloom.desc2: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
cobblemon.species.vileplume.name: Vileplume
cobblemon.species.vileplume.desc1: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
cobblemon.species.vileplume.desc2: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
cobblemon.species.parasect.name: Parasect
cobblemon.species.parasect.desc1: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.
cobblemon.species.venomoth.name: Venomoth
cobblemon.species.venomoth.desc1: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.
cobblemon.species.dugtrio.name: Dugtrio
cobblemon.species.dugtrio.desc1: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
cobblemon.species.dugtrio.desc2: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what it’s like underground.
cobblemon.species.persian.name: Persian
cobblemon.species.persian.desc1: Getting this prideful Pokémon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.
cobblemon.species.persian.desc2: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.
cobblemon.species.golduck.name: Golduck
cobblemon.species.golduck.desc1: This Pokémon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display.
cobblemon.species.golduck.desc2: Old tales tell of Golduck punishing those that defiled its river. The guilty were dragged into the water and taken away.
cobblemon.species.primeape.name: Primeape
cobblemon.species.primeape.desc1: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
cobblemon.species.arcanine.name: Arcanine
cobblemon.species.arcanine.desc1: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.
cobblemon.species.arcanine.desc2: A Pokémon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
cobblemon.species.poliwhirl.name: Poliwhirl
cobblemon.species.poliwhirl.desc1: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirl’s has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.
cobblemon.species.poliwhirl.desc2: This Pokémon’s sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies’ grasp and escape.
cobblemon.species.poliwrath.name: Poliwrath
cobblemon.species.poliwrath.desc1: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.
cobblemon.species.poliwrath.desc2: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.
cobblemon.species.kadabra.name: Kadabra
cobblemon.species.kadabra.desc1: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.
cobblemon.species.kadabra.desc2: This Pokémon’s telekinesis is immensely powerful. To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up psychic energy in the star on its forehead.
cobblemon.species.alakazam.name: Alakazam
cobblemon.species.alakazam.desc1: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.
cobblemon.species.alakazam.desc2: Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. It’s said that this Pokémon used these powers to create the spoons it holds.
cobblemon.species.machoke.name: Machoke
cobblemon.species.machoke.desc1: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
cobblemon.species.machoke.desc2: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.
cobblemon.species.machamp.name: Machamp
cobblemon.species.machamp.desc1: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
cobblemon.species.machamp.desc2: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.
cobblemon.species.weepinbell.name: Weepinbell
cobblemon.species.weepinbell.desc1: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.
cobblemon.species.victreebel.name: Victreebel
cobblemon.species.victreebel.desc1: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.
cobblemon.species.tentacruel.name: Tentacruel
cobblemon.species.tentacruel.desc1: When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.
cobblemon.species.tentacruel.desc2: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and shrink freely. Tentacruel ensnares prey in a net of spread-out tentacles, delivering venomous stings to its catch.
cobblemon.species.graveler.name: Graveler
cobblemon.species.graveler.desc1: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.
cobblemon.species.golem.name: Golem
cobblemon.species.golem.desc1: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it’s exposed to air.
cobblemon.species.rapidash.name: Rapidash
cobblemon.species.rapidash.desc1: This Pokémon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.
cobblemon.species.rapidash.desc2: The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it decides the herd’s pace and direction of travel.
cobblemon.species.slowbro.name: Slowbro
cobblemon.species.slowbro.desc1: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.
cobblemon.species.slowbro.desc2: Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokémon into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go, it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.
cobblemon.species.magneton.name: Magneton
cobblemon.species.magneton.desc1: This Pokémon is three Magnemite that have linked together. Magneton sends out powerful radio waves to study its surroundings.
cobblemon.species.magneton.desc2: This Pokémon is constantly putting out a powerful magnetic force. Most computers go haywire when a Magneton approaches.
cobblemon.species.dodrio.name: Dodrio
cobblemon.species.dodrio.desc1: One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.
cobblemon.species.dewgong.name: Dewgong
cobblemon.species.dewgong.desc1: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.
cobblemon.species.muk.name: Muk
cobblemon.species.muk.desc1: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.
cobblemon.species.cloyster.name: Cloyster
cobblemon.species.cloyster.desc1: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
cobblemon.species.cloyster.desc2: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.
cobblemon.species.haunter.name: Haunter
cobblemon.species.haunter.desc1: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
cobblemon.species.haunter.desc2: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
cobblemon.species.gengar.name: Gengar
cobblemon.species.gengar.desc1: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengar’s doing.
cobblemon.species.gengar.desc2: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
cobblemon.species.hypno.name: Hypno
cobblemon.species.hypno.desc1: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
cobblemon.species.kingler.name: Kingler
cobblemon.species.kingler.desc1: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
cobblemon.species.kingler.desc2: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when it’s not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.
cobblemon.species.electrode.name: Electrode
cobblemon.species.electrode.desc1: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.
cobblemon.species.exeggutor.name: Exeggutor
cobblemon.species.exeggutor.desc1: Each of Exeggutor’s three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three don’t seem to be very interested in one another.
cobblemon.species.exeggutor.desc2: When they work together, Exeggutor’s three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokémon sluggish.
cobblemon.species.marowak.name: Marowak
cobblemon.species.marowak.desc1: This Pokémon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.
cobblemon.species.marowak.desc2: When this Pokémon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowak’s temperament also turned vicious at the same time.
cobblemon.species.hitmonlee.name: Hitmonlee
cobblemon.species.hitmonlee.desc1: This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
cobblemon.species.hitmonlee.desc2: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
cobblemon.species.hitmonchan.name: Hitmonchan
cobblemon.species.hitmonchan.desc1: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
cobblemon.species.hitmonchan.desc2: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
cobblemon.species.weezing.name: Weezing
cobblemon.species.weezing.desc1: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It’s said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.
cobblemon.species.weezing.desc2: It can’t suck in air quite as well as a Galarian Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more potent than those of its counterpart.
cobblemon.species.rhydon.name: Rhydon
cobblemon.species.rhydon.desc1: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
cobblemon.species.rhydon.desc2: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.chansey.name: Chansey
cobblemon.species.chansey.desc1: The egg Chansey carries is not only delicious but also packed with nutrition. It’s used as a high-class cooking ingredient.
cobblemon.species.chansey.desc2: This species was once very slow. To protect their eggs from other creatures, these Pokémon became able to flee quickly.
cobblemon.species.seadra.name: Seadra
cobblemon.species.seadra.desc1: It’s the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.
cobblemon.species.seadra.desc2: Seadra’s mouth is slender, but its suction power is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food that’s larger than the opening of its mouth.
cobblemon.species.seaking.name: Seaking
cobblemon.species.seaking.desc1: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.
cobblemon.species.seaking.desc2: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.
cobblemon.species.starmie.name: Starmie
cobblemon.species.starmie.desc1: This Pokémon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.starmie.desc2: Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokémon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.
cobblemon.species.mrmime.name: Mr. Mime
cobblemon.species.mrmime.desc1: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence—many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.
cobblemon.species.mrmime.desc2: It’s known for its top-notch pantomime skills. It protects itself from all sorts of attacks by emitting auras from its fingers to create walls.
cobblemon.species.jynx.name: Jynx
cobblemon.species.jynx.desc1: In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.
cobblemon.species.jynx.desc2: The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokémon have even gathered a fan base.
cobblemon.species.electabuzz.name: Electabuzz
cobblemon.species.electabuzz.desc1: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokémon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.
cobblemon.species.electabuzz.desc2: With the coming of a storm, many of these Pokémon will gather under tall trees and sit there waiting for lightning to strike.
cobblemon.species.magmar.name: Magmar
cobblemon.species.magmar.desc1: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.
cobblemon.species.magmar.desc2: These Pokémon’s bodies are constantly burning. Magmar are feared as one of the causes behind fires.
cobblemon.species.gyarados.name: Gyarados
cobblemon.species.gyarados.desc1: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.
cobblemon.species.gyarados.desc2: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
cobblemon.species.vaporeon.name: Vaporeon
cobblemon.species.vaporeon.desc1: When Vaporeon’s fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
cobblemon.species.vaporeon.desc2: Its body’s cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water.
cobblemon.species.jolteon.name: Jolteon
cobblemon.species.jolteon.desc1: If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes.
cobblemon.species.jolteon.desc2: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.
cobblemon.species.flareon.name: Flareon
cobblemon.species.flareon.desc1: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokémon’s body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.flareon.desc2: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
cobblemon.species.omastar.name: Omastar
cobblemon.species.omastar.desc1: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldn’t move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.
cobblemon.species.omastar.desc2: Omastar’s sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokémon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.
cobblemon.species.kabutops.name: Kabutops
cobblemon.species.kabutops.desc1: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.kabutops.desc2: The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokémon that inhabited warm seas.
cobblemon.species.snorlax.name: Snorlax
cobblemon.species.snorlax.desc1: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
cobblemon.species.snorlax.desc2: This Pokémon’s stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.
cobblemon.species.dragonair.name: Dragonair
cobblemon.species.dragonair.desc1: This Pokémon lives in pristine oceans and lakes. It can control the weather, and it uses this power to fly into the sky, riding on the wind.
cobblemon.species.dragonair.desc2: This Pokémon gathers power in the orbs on its tail and controls the weather. When enshrouded by an aura, Dragonair has a mystical appearance.
cobblemon.species.dragonite.name: Dragonite
cobblemon.species.dragonite.desc1: It’s a kindhearted Pokémon. If it spots a drowning person or Pokémon, Dragonite simply must help them.
cobblemon.species.dragonite.desc2: This Pokémon is known as the Sea Incarnate. Figureheads that resemble Dragonite decorate the bows of many ships.
cobblemon.species.bayleef.name: Bayleef
cobblemon.species.bayleef.desc1: Bayleef’s neck is ringed by curled-up leaves. Inside each tubular leaf is a small shoot of a tree. The fragrance of this shoot makes people peppy.
cobblemon.species.meganium.name: Meganium
cobblemon.species.meganium.desc1: The fragrance of Meganium’s flower soothes and calms emotions. In battle, this Pokémon gives off more of its becalming scent to blunt the foe’s fighting spirit.
cobblemon.species.quilava.name: Quilava
cobblemon.species.quilava.desc1: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.
cobblemon.species.quilava.desc2: Quilava keeps its foes at bay with the intensity of its flames and gusts of superheated air. This Pokémon applies its outstanding nimbleness to dodge attacks even while scorching the foe with flames.
cobblemon.species.typhlosion.name: Typhlosion
cobblemon.species.typhlosion.desc1: Typhlosion obscures itself behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intensely hot flames. This Pokémon creates blazing explosive blasts that burn everything to cinders.
cobblemon.species.croconaw.name: Croconaw
cobblemon.species.croconaw.desc1: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
cobblemon.species.croconaw.desc2: Once Croconaw has clamped its jaws on its foe, it will absolutely not let go. Because the tips of its fangs are forked back like barbed fishhooks, they become impossible to remove when they have sunk in.
cobblemon.species.feraligatr.name: Feraligatr
cobblemon.species.feraligatr.desc1: Feraligatr intimidates its foes by opening its huge mouth. In battle, it will kick the ground hard with its thick and powerful hind legs to charge at the foe at an incredible speed.
cobblemon.species.furret.name: Furret
cobblemon.species.furret.desc1: Furret has a very slim build. When under attack, it can slickly squirm through narrow spaces and get away. In spite of its short limbs, this Pokémon is very nimble and fleet.
cobblemon.species.noctowl.name: Noctowl
cobblemon.species.noctowl.desc1: Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.
cobblemon.species.noctowl.desc2: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 degrees to sharpen its intellectual power.
cobblemon.species.ledian.name: Ledian
cobblemon.species.ledian.desc1: It’s said that the patterns on its back are related to the stars in the night sky, but the details of that relationship remain unclear.
cobblemon.species.ledian.desc2: It flies through the night sky, sprinkling sparkly dust. According to some, if that dust sticks to you, good things will happen to you.
cobblemon.species.ariados.name: Ariados
cobblemon.species.ariados.desc1: Every night, it wanders around in search of prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing threads before it bites into them with its fangs.
cobblemon.species.ariados.desc2: It spews threads from its mouth to catch its prey. When night falls, it leaves its web to go hunt aggressively.
cobblemon.species.crobat.name: Crobat
cobblemon.species.crobat.desc1: Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and sinks its fangs into the nape of its target’s neck.
cobblemon.species.crobat.desc2: This Pokémon flaps its four wings skillfully. Crobat can fly through cramped caves without needing to slow down.
cobblemon.species.lanturn.name: Lanturn
cobblemon.species.lanturn.desc1: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.
cobblemon.species.lanturn.desc2: This Pokémon flashes a bright light that blinds its prey. This creates an opening for it to deliver an electrical attack.
cobblemon.species.togetic.name: Togetic
cobblemon.species.togetic.desc1: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.
cobblemon.species.togetic.desc2: It grows dispirited if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.
cobblemon.species.xatu.name: Xatu
cobblemon.species.xatu.desc1: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.
cobblemon.species.xatu.desc2: This odd Pokémon can see both the past and the future. It eyes the sun’s movement all day.
cobblemon.species.flaaffy.name: Flaaffy
cobblemon.species.flaaffy.desc1: In the places on its body where fleece doesn’t grow, its skin is rubbery and doesn’t conduct electricity. Those spots are safe to touch.
cobblemon.species.flaaffy.desc2: It stores electricity in its fluffy fleece. If it stores up too much, it will start to go bald in those patches.
cobblemon.species.ampharos.name: Ampharos
cobblemon.species.ampharos.desc1: The light from its tail can be seen from space. This is why you can always tell exactly where it is, which is why it usually keeps the light off.
cobblemon.species.ampharos.desc2: Its tail shines bright and strong. It has been prized since long ago as a beacon for sailors.
cobblemon.species.bellossom.name: Bellossom
cobblemon.species.bellossom.desc1: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.
cobblemon.species.bellossom.desc2: Bellossom gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.
cobblemon.species.marill.name: Marill
cobblemon.species.marill.desc1: This Pokémon uses its round tail as a float. The ball of Marill’s tail is filled with nutrients that have been turned into an oil.
cobblemon.species.marill.desc2: Even after Marill swims in a cold sea, its water- repellent fur dries almost as soon as Marill leaves the water. That’s why this Pokémon is never cold.
cobblemon.species.azumarill.name: Azumarill
cobblemon.species.azumarill.desc1: It spends most of its time in the water. On sunny days, Azumarill floats on the surface of the water and sunbathes.
cobblemon.species.azumarill.desc2: These Pokémon create air-filled bubbles. When Azurill play in rivers, Azumarill will cover them with these bubbles.
cobblemon.species.sudowoodo.name: Sudowoodo
cobblemon.species.sudowoodo.desc1: If a tree branch shakes when there is no wind, it’s a Sudowoodo, not a tree. It hides from the rain.
cobblemon.species.sudowoodo.desc2: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.
cobblemon.species.politoed.name: Politoed
cobblemon.species.politoed.desc1: At nightfall, these Pokémon appear on the shores of lakes. They announce their territorial claims by letting out cries that sound like shouting.
cobblemon.species.politoed.desc2: The cry of a male is louder than that of a female. Male Politoed with deep, menacing voices find more popularity with the opposite gender.
cobblemon.species.skiploom.name: Skiploom
cobblemon.species.skiploom.desc1: Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon is sometimes used as a thermometer.
cobblemon.species.jumpluff.name: Jumpluff
cobblemon.species.jumpluff.desc1: Jumpluff rides warm southern winds to cross the sea and fly to foreign lands. The Pokémon descends to the ground when it encounters cold air while it is floating.
cobblemon.species.sunflora.name: Sunflora
cobblemon.species.sunflora.desc1: Sunflora converts solar energy into nutrition. It moves around actively in the daytime when it is warm. It stops moving as soon as the sun goes down for the night.
cobblemon.species.quagsire.name: Quagsire
cobblemon.species.quagsire.desc1: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.
cobblemon.species.quagsire.desc2: Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head on the river bottom as it swims but seems not to care.
cobblemon.species.espeon.name: Espeon
cobblemon.species.espeon.desc1: By reading air currents, it can predict things such as the weather or its foe’s next move.
cobblemon.species.espeon.desc2: It unleashes psychic power from the orb on its forehead. When its power is exhausted, the orb grows dull and dark.
cobblemon.species.umbreon.name: Umbreon
cobblemon.species.umbreon.desc1: When this Pokémon becomes angry, its pores secrete a poisonous sweat, which it sprays at its opponent’s eyes.
cobblemon.species.umbreon.desc2: On the night of a full moon, or when it gets excited, the ring patterns on its body glow yellow.
cobblemon.species.slowking.name: Slowking
cobblemon.species.slowking.desc1: Miraculously, this former Slowpoke’s latent intelligence was drawn out when Shellder poison raced through its brain.
cobblemon.species.slowking.desc2: Slowking can solve any problem presented to it, but no one can understand a thing Slowking says.
cobblemon.species.wobbuffet.name: Wobbuffet
cobblemon.species.wobbuffet.desc1: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.
cobblemon.species.wobbuffet.desc2: To keep its pitch-black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.
cobblemon.species.forretress.name: Forretress
cobblemon.species.forretress.desc1: When something approaches it, it fires off fragments of its steel shell in attack. This is not a conscious action but a conditioned reflex.
cobblemon.species.forretress.desc2: In the moment that it gulps down its prey, the inside of its shell is exposed, but to this day, no one has ever seen that sight.
cobblemon.species.steelix.name: Steelix
cobblemon.species.steelix.desc1: It is said that if an Onix lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.
cobblemon.species.steelix.desc2: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
cobblemon.species.granbull.name: Granbull
cobblemon.species.granbull.desc1: While it has powerful jaws, it doesn’t care for disputes, so it rarely has a chance to display their might.
cobblemon.species.granbull.desc2: Although it’s popular with young people, Granbull is timid and sensitive, so it’s totally incompetent as a watchdog.
cobblemon.species.scizor.name: Scizor
cobblemon.species.scizor.desc1: Bulky pincers account for one third of Scizor’s body weight. A single swing of one of these pincers will crush a boulder completely.
cobblemon.species.scizor.desc2: Though its body is slim, Scizor has tremendous attacking power. Even Scizor’s muscles are made of metal.
cobblemon.species.ursaring.name: Ursaring
cobblemon.species.ursaring.desc1: In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This Pokémon walks through its forest gathering food every day.
cobblemon.species.ursaring.desc2: In the forests inhabited by Ursaring, it is said that there are many streams and towering trees where they gather food. This Pokémon walks through its forest gathering food every day.
cobblemon.species.magcargo.name: Magcargo
cobblemon.species.magcargo.desc1: Magcargo’s shell is actually its skin that hardened as a result of cooling. Its shell is very brittle and fragile—just touching it causes it to crumble apart. This Pokémon returns to its original size by dipping itself in magma.
cobblemon.species.magcargo.desc2: Magcargo’s body temperature is approximately 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit. Water is vaporized on contact. If this Pokémon is caught in the rain, the raindrops instantly turn into steam, cloaking the area in a thick fog.
cobblemon.species.piloswine.name: Piloswine
cobblemon.species.piloswine.desc1: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensitive to sound.
cobblemon.species.piloswine.desc2: Although its legs are short, its rugged hooves prevent it from slipping, even on icy ground.
cobblemon.species.octillery.name: Octillery
cobblemon.species.octillery.desc1: It has a tendency to want to be in holes. It prefers rock crags or pots and sprays ink from them before attacking.
cobblemon.species.octillery.desc2: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles, then smashes them with its rock-hard head.
cobblemon.species.mantine.name: Mantine
cobblemon.species.mantine.desc1: If it builds up enough speed swimming, it can jump out above the waves and glide for over 300 feet.
cobblemon.species.mantine.desc2: As it majestically swims, it doesn’t care if Remoraid attach to it to scavenge for its leftovers.
cobblemon.species.houndoom.name: Houndoom
cobblemon.species.houndoom.desc1: They spew flames mixed with poison to finish off their opponents. They divvy up their prey evenly among the members of their pack.
cobblemon.species.houndoom.desc2: Identifiable by its eerie howls, people a long time ago thought it was the grim reaper and feared it.
cobblemon.species.kingdra.name: Kingdra
cobblemon.species.kingdra.desc1: With the arrival of a storm at sea, this Pokémon will show itself on the surface. When a Kingdra and a Dragonite meet, a fierce battle ensues.
cobblemon.species.kingdra.desc2: Scales shed by this Pokémon have such a splendorous gleam to them that they’ve been given to royalty as gifts.
cobblemon.species.donphan.name: Donphan
cobblemon.species.donphan.desc1: Donphan’s favorite attack is curling its body into a ball, then charging at its foe while rolling at high speed. Once it starts rolling, this Pokémon can’t stop very easily.
cobblemon.species.donphan.desc2: If Donphan were to tackle with its hard body, even a house could be destroyed. Using its massive strength, the Pokémon helps clear rock and mud slides that block mountain trails.
cobblemon.species.porygon2.name: Porygon2
cobblemon.species.porygon2.desc1: This is a Porygon that was updated with special data. Porygon2 develops itself by learning about many different subjects all on its own.
cobblemon.species.porygon2.desc2: After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokémon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.
cobblemon.species.hitmontop.name: Hitmontop
cobblemon.species.hitmontop.desc1: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
cobblemon.species.hitmontop.desc2: After doing a handstand to throw off the opponent’s timing, it presents its fancy kick moves.
cobblemon.species.blissey.name: Blissey
cobblemon.species.blissey.desc1: Whenever a Blissey finds a weakened Pokémon, it will share its egg and offer its care until the other Pokémon is all better.
cobblemon.species.blissey.desc2: Blissey lays mysterious eggs that are filled with happiness. It’s said that anyone who eats a Blissey egg will start acting kindly to all others.
cobblemon.species.pupitar.name: Pupitar
cobblemon.species.pupitar.desc1: Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely. Hard and fast, it has outstanding destructive power.
cobblemon.species.pupitar.desc2: It will not stay still, even while it’s a pupa. It already has arms and legs under its solid shell.
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.name: Tyranitar
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.desc1: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
cobblemon.species.tyranitar.desc2: The quakes caused when it walks make even great mountains crumble and change the surrounding terrain.
cobblemon.species.grovyle.name: Grovyle
cobblemon.species.grovyle.desc1: The leaves growing out of Grovyle’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This Pokémon is a master at climbing trees in jungles.
cobblemon.species.grovyle.desc2: This Pokémon adeptly flies from branch to branch in trees. In a forest, no Pokémon can ever hope to catch a fleeing Grovyle however fast they may be.
cobblemon.species.sceptile.name: Sceptile
cobblemon.species.sceptile.desc1: The leaves growing on Sceptile’s body are very sharp edged. This Pokémon is very agile—it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.
cobblemon.species.sceptile.desc2: Sceptile has seeds growing on its back. They are said to be bursting with nutrients that revitalize trees. This Pokémon raises the trees in a forest with loving care.
cobblemon.species.combusken.name: Combusken
cobblemon.species.combusken.desc1: Combusken toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This Pokémon’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out 10 kicks in one second.
cobblemon.species.combusken.desc2: Combusken battles with the intensely hot flames it spews from its beak and with outstandingly destructive kicks. This Pokémon’s cry is very loud and distracting.
cobblemon.species.blaziken.name: Blaziken
cobblemon.species.blaziken.desc1: In battle, Blaziken blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this Pokémon’s wrists burn.
cobblemon.species.blaziken.desc2: Blaziken has incredibly strong legs—it can easily clear a 30-story building in one leap. This Pokémon’s blazing punches leave its foes scorched and blackened.
cobblemon.species.marshtomp.name: Marshtomp
cobblemon.species.marshtomp.desc1: The surface of Marshtomp’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This Pokémon plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.
cobblemon.species.marshtomp.desc2: Marshtomp is much faster at traveling through mud than it is at swimming. This Pokémon’s hindquarters exhibit obvious development, giving it the ability to walk on just its hind legs.
cobblemon.species.swampert.name: Swampert
cobblemon.species.swampert.desc1: Swampert is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This Pokémon also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.
cobblemon.species.swampert.desc2: Swampert predicts storms by sensing subtle differences in the sounds of waves and tidal winds with its fins. If a storm is approaching, it piles up boulders to protect itself.
cobblemon.species.mightyena.name: Mightyena
cobblemon.species.mightyena.desc1: Mightyena gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This Pokémon will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.
cobblemon.species.mightyena.desc2: Mightyena travel and act as a pack in the wild. The memory of its life in the wild compels the Pokémon to obey only those Trainers that it recognizes to possess superior skill.
cobblemon.species.linoone.name: Linoone
cobblemon.species.linoone.desc1: Its fur is strong and supple. Shaving brushes made with shed Linoone hairs are highly prized.
cobblemon.species.linoone.desc2: It uses its explosive speed and razor-sharp claws to bring down prey. Running along winding paths is not its strong suit.
cobblemon.species.silcoon.name: Silcoon
cobblemon.species.silcoon.desc1: Silcoon tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this Pokémon hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.
cobblemon.species.silcoon.desc2: Silcoon was thought to endure hunger and not consume anything before its evolution. However, it is now thought that this Pokémon slakes its thirst by drinking rainwater that collects on its silk.
cobblemon.species.beautifly.name: Beautifly
cobblemon.species.beautifly.desc1: Beautifly’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this Pokémon, just leave a potted flower by an open window. Beautifly is sure to come looking for pollen.
cobblemon.species.beautifly.desc2: Beautifly has a long mouth like a coiled needle, which is very convenient for collecting pollen from flowers. This Pokémon rides the spring winds as it flits around gathering pollen.
cobblemon.species.cascoon.name: Cascoon
cobblemon.species.cascoon.desc1: Cascoon makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This Pokémon prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.
cobblemon.species.cascoon.desc2: If it is attacked, Cascoon remains motionless however badly it may be hurt. It does so because if it were to move, its body would be weak upon evolution. This Pokémon will also not forget the pain it endured.
cobblemon.species.dustox.name: Dustox
cobblemon.species.dustox.desc1: Dustox is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this Pokémon are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.
cobblemon.species.dustox.desc2: When Dustox flaps its wings, a fine dust is scattered all over. This dust is actually a powerful poison that will even make a pro wrestler sick. This Pokémon searches for food using its antennae like radar.
cobblemon.species.lombre.name: Lombre
cobblemon.species.lombre.desc1: It is nocturnal and becomes active at nightfall. It feeds on aquatic mosses that grow in the riverbed.
cobblemon.species.lombre.desc2: It lives at the water’s edge where it is sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass by day and becomes active at night.
cobblemon.species.ludicolo.name: Ludicolo
cobblemon.species.ludicolo.desc1: The rhythm of bright, festive music activates Ludicolo’s cells, making it more powerful.
cobblemon.species.ludicolo.desc2: If it hears festive music, it begins moving in rhythm in order to amplify its power.
cobblemon.species.nuzleaf.name: Nuzleaf
cobblemon.species.nuzleaf.desc1: It lives deep in forests. With the leaf on its head, it makes a flute whose song makes listeners uneasy.
cobblemon.species.nuzleaf.desc2: They live in holes bored in large trees. The sound of Nuzleaf’s grass flute fills listeners with dread.
cobblemon.species.shiftry.name: Shiftry
cobblemon.species.shiftry.desc1: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe’s mind and take preemptive action.
cobblemon.species.shiftry.desc2: It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.
cobblemon.species.swellow.name: Swellow
cobblemon.species.swellow.desc1: Swellow flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This Pokémon dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by Swellow’s clawed feet, preventing escape.
cobblemon.species.swellow.desc2: Swellow is very conscientious about the upkeep of its glossy wings. Once two Swellow are gathered, they diligently take care of cleaning each other’s wings.
cobblemon.species.pelipper.name: Pelipper
cobblemon.species.pelipper.desc1: It is a messenger of the skies, carrying small Pokémon and eggs to safety in its bill.
cobblemon.species.pelipper.desc2: Skimming the water’s surface, it dips its large bill in the sea, scoops up food and water, and carries it.
cobblemon.species.kirlia.name: Kirlia
cobblemon.species.kirlia.desc1: If its Trainer becomes happy, it overflows with energy, dancing joyously while spinning about.
cobblemon.species.kirlia.desc2: It has a psychic power that enables it to distort the space around it and see into the future.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir.name: Gardevoir
cobblemon.species.gardevoir.desc1: It has the power to predict the future. Its power peaks when it is protecting its Trainer.
cobblemon.species.gardevoir.desc2: To protect its Trainer, it will expend all its psychic power to create a small black hole.
cobblemon.species.masquerain.name: Masquerain
cobblemon.species.masquerain.desc1: Masquerain intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns of its eyespots. If that doesn’t work, it deftly makes its escape on its set of four wings.
cobblemon.species.masquerain.desc2: Its thin, winglike antennae are highly absorbent. It waits out rainy days in tree hollows.
cobblemon.species.breloom.name: Breloom
cobblemon.species.breloom.desc1: Breloom closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This Pokémon’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.
cobblemon.species.breloom.desc2: The seeds ringing Breloom’s tail are made of hardened toxic spores. It is horrible to eat the seeds. Just taking a bite of this Pokémon’s seed will cause your stomach to rumble.
cobblemon.species.vigoroth.name: Vigoroth
cobblemon.species.vigoroth.desc1: Vigoroth is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This Pokémon’s stress level rises if it can’t be moving constantly.
cobblemon.species.vigoroth.desc2: Vigoroth is simply incapable of remaining still. Even when it tries to sleep, the blood in its veins grows agitated, compelling this Pokémon to run wild throughout the jungle before it can settle down.
cobblemon.species.slaking.name: Slaking
cobblemon.species.slaking.desc1: Slaking spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this Pokémon reluctantly moves to another spot.
cobblemon.species.slaking.desc2: Wherever Slaking live, rings of over a yard in diameter appear in grassy fields. They are made by the Pokémon as it eats all the grass within reach while lying prone on the ground.
cobblemon.species.ninjask.name: Ninjask
cobblemon.species.ninjask.desc1: Its cry leaves a lasting headache if heard for too long. It moves so quickly that it is almost invisible.
cobblemon.species.ninjask.desc2: This Pokémon is so quick, it is said to be able to avoid any attack. It loves to feed on tree sap.
cobblemon.species.shedinja.name: Shedinja
cobblemon.species.shedinja.desc1: A most peculiar Pokémon that somehow appears in a Poké Ball when a Nincada evolves.
cobblemon.species.shedinja.desc2: A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell for a body, and does not breathe.
cobblemon.species.loudred.name: Loudred
cobblemon.species.loudred.desc1: Loudred’s ears serve as speakers, and they can put out sound waves powerful enough to blow away a house.
cobblemon.species.loudred.desc2: The force of this Pokémon’s loud voice isn’t just the sound—it’s also the wave of air pressure that blows opponents away and damages them.
cobblemon.species.exploud.name: Exploud
cobblemon.species.exploud.desc1: In the past, people would use the loud voices of these Pokémon as a means of communication between distant cities.
cobblemon.species.exploud.desc2: This Pokémon can do more than just shout. To communicate with others of its kind, it’ll emit all sorts of sounds from the holes in its body.
cobblemon.species.hariyama.name: Hariyama
cobblemon.species.hariyama.desc1: Although they enjoy comparing their strength, they’re also kind. They value etiquette, praising opponents they battle.
cobblemon.species.hariyama.desc2: Hariyama that are big and fat aren’t necessarily strong. There are some small ones that move nimbly and use moves skillfully.
cobblemon.species.delcatty.name: Delcatty
cobblemon.species.delcatty.desc1: Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.
cobblemon.species.delcatty.desc2: Delcatty sleeps anywhere it wants without keeping a permanent nest. If other Pokémon approach it as it sleeps, this Pokémon will never fight—it will just move away somewhere else.
cobblemon.species.lairon.name: Lairon
cobblemon.species.lairon.desc1: Lairon live in mountains brimming with spring water and iron ore, so these Pokémon often came into conflict with humans in the past.
cobblemon.species.lairon.desc2: During territorial disputes, Lairon fight by slamming into each other. Close inspection of their steel armor reveals scratches and dents.
cobblemon.species.aggron.name: Aggron
cobblemon.species.aggron.desc1: Aggron has a horn sharp enough to perforate thick iron sheets. It brings down its opponents by ramming into them horn first.
cobblemon.species.aggron.desc2: Long ago, there was a king who wore a helmet meant to resemble the head of an Aggron. He was trying to channel the Pokémon’s strength.
cobblemon.species.medicham.name: Medicham
cobblemon.species.medicham.desc1: It is said that through meditation, Medicham heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This Pokémon hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
cobblemon.species.medicham.desc2: Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed its sixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers. This Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole month without eating.
cobblemon.species.manectric.name: Manectric
cobblemon.species.manectric.desc1: It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.
cobblemon.species.manectric.desc2: It rarely appears before people. It is said to nest where lightning has fallen.
cobblemon.species.roselia.name: Roselia
cobblemon.species.roselia.desc1: Its flowers give off a relaxing fragrance. The stronger its aroma, the healthier the Roselia is.
cobblemon.species.roselia.desc2: It uses the different poisons in each hand separately when it attacks. The stronger its aroma, the healthier it is.
cobblemon.species.swalot.name: Swalot
cobblemon.species.swalot.desc1: When Swalot spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this Pokémon gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.
cobblemon.species.swalot.desc2: Swalot has no teeth, so what it eats, it swallows whole, no matter what. Its cavernous mouth yawns widely. An automobile tire could easily fit inside this Pokémon’s mouth.
cobblemon.species.sharpedo.name: Sharpedo
cobblemon.species.sharpedo.desc1: As soon as it catches the scent of prey, Sharpedo will jet seawater from its backside, hurtling toward the target to attack at 75 mph.
cobblemon.species.sharpedo.desc2: This Pokémon is known as the Bully of the Sea. Any ship entering the waters Sharpedo calls home will be attacked—no exceptions.
cobblemon.species.wailord.name: Wailord
cobblemon.species.wailord.desc1: It can sometimes knock out opponents with the shock created by breaching and crashing its big body onto the water.
cobblemon.species.wailord.desc2: Its immense size is the reason for its popularity. Wailord watching is a favorite sightseeing activity in various parts of the world.
cobblemon.species.camerupt.name: Camerupt
cobblemon.species.camerupt.desc1: Camerupt has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees Fahrenheit courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this Pokémon’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.
cobblemon.species.camerupt.desc2: The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma. This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.
cobblemon.species.grumpig.name: Grumpig
cobblemon.species.grumpig.desc1: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this Pokémon uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.
cobblemon.species.grumpig.desc2: Grumpig uses the black pearls on its body to wield its fantastic powers. When it is doing so, it dances bizarrely. This Pokémon’s black pearls are valuable as works of art.
cobblemon.species.vibrava.name: Vibrava
cobblemon.species.vibrava.desc1: The ultrasonic waves it generates by rubbing its two wings together cause severe headaches.
cobblemon.species.vibrava.desc2: To help make its wings grow, it dissolves quantities of prey in its digestive juices and guzzles them down every day.
cobblemon.species.flygon.name: Flygon
cobblemon.species.flygon.desc1: This Pokémon hides in the heart of sandstorms it creates and seldom appears where people can see it.
cobblemon.species.flygon.desc2: It is nicknamed the Desert Spirit because the flapping of its wings sounds like a woman singing.
cobblemon.species.cacturne.name: Cacturne
cobblemon.species.cacturne.desc1: During the daytime, Cacturne remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This Pokémon becomes active at night when the temperature drops.
cobblemon.species.cacturne.desc2: If a traveler is going through a desert in the thick of night, Cacturne will follow in a ragtag group. The Pokémon are biding their time, waiting for the traveler to tire and become incapable of moving.
cobblemon.species.altaria.name: Altaria
cobblemon.species.altaria.desc1: As it flies in a calm and relaxed manner, Altaria performs a humming song that would enrapture any audience.
cobblemon.species.altaria.desc2: This Pokémon has a kind disposition, but if it’s provoked, it will threaten opponents with shrill cries before attacking them without mercy.
cobblemon.species.whiscash.name: Whiscash
cobblemon.species.whiscash.desc1: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything—if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.
cobblemon.species.whiscash.desc2: It claims a large swamp to itself. If a foe comes near it, it sets off tremors by thrashing around.
cobblemon.species.crawdaunt.name: Crawdaunt
cobblemon.species.crawdaunt.desc1: A rough customer that wildly flails its giant claws. It is said to be extremely hard to raise.
cobblemon.species.crawdaunt.desc2: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. It will crash itself into any foe that approaches its nest.
cobblemon.species.claydol.name: Claydol
cobblemon.species.claydol.desc1: This mysterious Pokémon started life as an ancient clay figurine made over 20,000 years ago.
cobblemon.species.claydol.desc2: It appears to have been born from clay dolls made by ancient people. It uses telekinesis to float and move.
cobblemon.species.cradily.name: Cradily
cobblemon.species.cradily.desc1: It has short legs and can’t walk very fast, but its neck and tentacles can extend to over three times their usual length to nab distant prey.
cobblemon.species.cradily.desc2: Once Cradily catches prey in its tentacles, it digests them whole and absorbs their nutrients.
cobblemon.species.armaldo.name: Armaldo
cobblemon.species.armaldo.desc1: After evolution, this Pokémon emerged onto land. Its lower body has become stronger, and blows from its tail are devastating.
cobblemon.species.armaldo.desc2: Though it lives on land, it’s also a good swimmer. It dives into the ocean in search of prey, using its sharp claws to take down its quarry.
cobblemon.species.milotic.name: Milotic
cobblemon.species.milotic.desc1: Milotic has provided inspiration to many artists. It has even been referred to as the most beautiful Pokémon of all.
cobblemon.species.milotic.desc2: It’s said that a glimpse of a Milotic and its beauty will calm any hostile emotions you’re feeling.
cobblemon.species.banette.name: Banette
cobblemon.species.banette.desc1: It’s a stuffed toy that was thrown away and became possessed, ever searching for the one who threw it away so it can exact its revenge.
cobblemon.species.banette.desc2: Resentment at being cast off made it spring into being. Some say that treating it well will satisfy it, and it will once more become a stuffed toy.
cobblemon.species.dusclops.name: Dusclops
cobblemon.species.dusclops.desc1: Its body is entirely hollow. When it opens its mouth, it sucks everything in as if it were a black hole.
cobblemon.species.dusclops.desc2: It seeks drifting will-o’-the-wisps and sucks them into its empty body. What happens inside is a mystery.
cobblemon.species.chimecho.name: Chimecho
cobblemon.species.chimecho.desc1: Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
cobblemon.species.chimecho.desc2: In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch or the eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. This Pokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
cobblemon.species.glalie.name: Glalie
cobblemon.species.glalie.desc1: It has a body of ice that won’t melt, even with fire. It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere.
cobblemon.species.glalie.desc2: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
cobblemon.species.sealeo.name: Sealeo
cobblemon.species.sealeo.desc1: Sealeo live on top of drift ice. They go swimming when they’re on the hunt, seeking out their prey by scent.
cobblemon.species.sealeo.desc2: This Pokémon has a habit of spinning round things on its nose, whether those things are Poké Balls or Spheal.
cobblemon.species.walrein.name: Walrein
cobblemon.species.walrein.desc1: Walrein form herds of 20 to 30 individuals. When a threat appears, the herd’s leader will protect the group with its life.
cobblemon.species.walrein.desc2: Walrein’s tusks keep growing throughout its life. Tusks broken in battle will grow back to their usual impressive size in a year.
cobblemon.species.huntail.name: Huntail
cobblemon.species.huntail.desc1: It’s not the strongest swimmer. It wags its tail to lure in its prey and then gulps them down as soon as they get close.
cobblemon.species.huntail.desc2: Deep seas are their habitat. According to tradition, when Huntail wash up onshore, something unfortunate will happen.
cobblemon.species.gorebyss.name: Gorebyss
cobblemon.species.gorebyss.desc1: The color of its body changes with the water temperature. The coloration of Gorebyss in Alola is almost blindingly vivid.
cobblemon.species.gorebyss.desc2: It sucks bodily fluids out of its prey. The leftover meat sinks to the seafloor, where it becomes food for other Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.shelgon.name: Shelgon
cobblemon.species.shelgon.desc1: This Pokémon has covered its body in a hard shell that has the same composition as bone. Shelgon stores energy for evolution.
cobblemon.species.shelgon.desc2: Shelgon ignores its hunger entirely, never eating any food. Apparently, Shelgon will evolve once all its energy stores are used up.
cobblemon.species.salamence.name: Salamence
cobblemon.species.salamence.desc1: Salamence is an unusual Pokémon in that it was able to evolve a body with wings just by constantly wishing to be able to fly.
cobblemon.species.salamence.desc2: While basking in the joy of flight generally keeps this Pokémon in high spirits, Salamence turns into an uncontrollable menace if something angers it.
cobblemon.species.metang.name: Metang
cobblemon.species.metang.desc1: Two Beldum have become stuck together via their own magnetic forces. With two brains, the resulting Metang has doubled psychic powers.
cobblemon.species.metang.desc2: Using magnetic forces to stay aloft, this Pokémon flies at high speeds, weaving through harsh mountain terrain in pursuit of prey.
cobblemon.species.metagross.name: Metagross
cobblemon.species.metagross.desc1: Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.
cobblemon.species.metagross.desc2: Metagross is the result of the fusion of two Metang. This Pokémon defeats its opponents through use of its supercomputer-level brain.
cobblemon.species.grotle.name: Grotle
cobblemon.species.grotle.desc1: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.
cobblemon.species.grotle.desc2: It knows where pure water wells up. It carries fellow Pokémon there on its back.
cobblemon.species.torterra.name: Torterra
cobblemon.species.torterra.desc1: Ancient people imagined that beneath the ground, a gigantic Torterra dwelled.
cobblemon.species.torterra.desc2: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.
cobblemon.species.monferno.name: Monferno
cobblemon.species.monferno.desc1: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.
cobblemon.species.monferno.desc2: It uses ceilings and walls to launch aerial attacks. Its fiery tail is but one weapon.
cobblemon.species.infernape.name: Infernape
cobblemon.species.infernape.desc1: Its crown of fire is indicative of its fiery nature. It is beaten by none in terms of quickness.
cobblemon.species.infernape.desc2: It tosses its enemies around with agility. It uses all its limbs to fight in its own unique style.
cobblemon.species.prinplup.name: Prinplup
cobblemon.species.prinplup.desc1: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.
cobblemon.species.prinplup.desc2: It lives a solitary life. Its wings deliver wicked blows that can snap even the thickest of trees.
cobblemon.species.empoleon.name: Empoleon
cobblemon.species.empoleon.desc1: It swims as fast as a jet boat. The edges of its wings are sharp and can slice apart drifting ice.
cobblemon.species.empoleon.desc2: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.
cobblemon.species.staravia.name: Staravia
cobblemon.species.staravia.desc1: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
cobblemon.species.staravia.desc2: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.
cobblemon.species.staraptor.name: Staraptor
cobblemon.species.staraptor.desc1: The muscles in its wings and legs are strong. It can easily fly while gripping a small Pokémon.
cobblemon.species.staraptor.desc2: When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.
cobblemon.species.bibarel.name: Bibarel
cobblemon.species.bibarel.desc1: It busily makes its nest with stacks of branches and roots it has cut up with its sharp incisors.
cobblemon.species.bibarel.desc2: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.
cobblemon.species.kricketune.name: Kricketune
cobblemon.species.kricketune.desc1: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.
cobblemon.species.kricketune.desc2: It signals its emotions with its melodies. Scientists are studying these melodic patterns.
cobblemon.species.luxio.name: Luxio
cobblemon.species.luxio.desc1: By joining its tail with that of another Luxio, this Pokémon can receive some of the other Luxio’s electricity and power up its own electric blasts.
cobblemon.species.luxio.desc2: Upon encountering an opponent, this Pokémon prepares for battle by extending its claws, which can put out 1,000,000 volts of electricity.
cobblemon.species.luxray.name: Luxray
cobblemon.species.luxray.desc1: Luxray can see through solid objects. It will instantly spot prey trying to hide behind walls, even if the walls are thick.
cobblemon.species.luxray.desc2: Seeing through solid objects uses up a lot of Luxray’s electricity, so the Pokémon sleeps for long periods of time to store up energy.
cobblemon.species.roserade.name: Roserade
cobblemon.species.roserade.desc1: After captivating opponents with its sweet scent, it lashes them with its thorny whips.
cobblemon.species.roserade.desc2: The poison in its right hand is quick acting. The poison in its left hand is slow acting. Both are life threatening.
cobblemon.species.rampardos.name: Rampardos
cobblemon.species.rampardos.desc1: In ancient times, people would dig up fossils of this Pokémon and use its skull, which is harder than steel, to make helmets.
cobblemon.species.rampardos.desc2: This ancient Pokémon used headbutts skillfully. Its brain was really small, so some theories suggest that its stupidity led to its extinction.
cobblemon.species.bastiodon.name: Bastiodon
cobblemon.species.bastiodon.desc1: The bones of its face are huge and hard, so they were mistaken for its spine until after this Pokémon was successfully restored.
cobblemon.species.bastiodon.desc2: This Pokémon is from roughly 100 million years ago. Its terrifyingly tough face is harder than steel.
cobblemon.species.wormadam.name: Wormadam
cobblemon.species.wormadam.desc1: Its appearance changes depending on where it evolved. The materials on hand become a part of its body.
cobblemon.species.wormadam.desc2: When Burmy evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.
cobblemon.species.mothim.name: Mothim
cobblemon.species.mothim.desc1: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by Combee.
cobblemon.species.mothim.desc2: It flutters around at night and steals honey from the Combee hive.
cobblemon.species.vespiquen.name: Vespiquen
cobblemon.species.vespiquen.desc1: It skillfully commands its grubs in battles with its enemies. The grubs are willing to risk their lives to defend Vespiquen.
cobblemon.species.vespiquen.desc2: Vespiquen that give off more pheromones have larger swarms of Combee attendants.
cobblemon.species.floatzel.name: Floatzel
cobblemon.species.floatzel.desc1: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.
cobblemon.species.floatzel.desc2: Its flotation sac developed as a result of pursuing aquatic prey. It can double as a rubber raft.
cobblemon.species.cherrim.name: Cherrim
cobblemon.species.cherrim.desc1: As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly waiting for sunlight to appear.
